item.title: Leadership Lecture Sam Manekshaw
item.description: Most of part is taken from summarized transcript by fellow youtuber at video According to manekshaw sir qualities of leader Professional competence : He provided example of Defence Minister who had no idea about howitzer, motor etc how can he lead the army officers !! Ability to take a decision and take a full responsibility for it : üëâüèª act of omission is much worse than act of commission of wrong.
